content: Who would come first in a real race, a kangaroo or a sloth?

In a real race, a kangaroo would definitely come first before a sloth. Kangaroos are known for their incredible jumping abilities and can reach speeds of up to 70 kilometers per hour (43 miles per hour). On the other hand, sloths are very slow-moving animals, with top speeds of around 0.15 kilometers per hour (0.09 miles per hour) when moving on the ground. So, there's no competition there; the kangaroo would easily win any race against a sloth.
